DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to examine the amount of dentifrice ingested and used by various age groups of children.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Ingestion of Dentifrice by Children
DOC.criteria: Be between the ages of 2 and 12, inclusive Be healthy, with no illness that, in the judgment of the investigator or examining dentist, would interfere with the conduct of the test Be currently, and have been for at least three months immediately prior to the start of the study, brushing (or being brushed by care giver) their teeth on a daily basis Have parent/guardian complete and return the consent form Have diabetes Be on dialysis Have an oral health condition that, in judgment of investigator or study medical personnel, could interfere with the conduct of the study. Wear metal braces Have an incomplete or missing consent form
